Do you feel a lot of pressure?
Because you are one of the few Asians here.
We at home are really really hoping to see more Asian faces.
So, do you have anything to say for people that want to be in the industry?
This is great, Oscars, an award,...
...but I think there should be more roles not only for African-Americans...
...but also Asians, Spanish, for all kinds of races.
We should focus on creating more roles for them.
